featured.text: Having saved enough money, Joy two trips for this summer vacation, one to France and the other to Australia.
We have followed your high-school career with joy and pleasure and know that your four years at college will be even more rewarding.
Relaxation and a feeling of joy are among the first noticeable differences in a Tai Chi student.

definition.zh_def: 喜悅；快樂的感覺或狀態。
definition.en_def: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness.
definition.example: The children's laughter filled the room with joy.
